cosmic_conquistadors

Class DefaultCritter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cosmic_conquistadors.DefaultCritter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Critter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Brigade, Enemy, Missile, Shooter

    public class DefaultCritter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Critter
    The DefaultCritter is the default implementation of the Critter interface. It uses the equations of motion to calculate how the Critter moves as time changes.
